prompt: Deadpan corporate technical diagram, clean vector lines, subtle shadows, off-white background, muted slate + graphite with cyan and safety orange accents. Big central diagram, consistent title placement top-left. Only include the exact text specified. No other text or numbers. Title text in top-left: 'End-to-end latency'. Diagram: A single horizontal pipeline bar split into labeled segments: 'network', 'queue', 'prefill', 'decode', 'service'. Only text: 'End-to-end latency', 'network', 'queue', 'prefill', 'decode', 'service'.
rubric: The slide uses a clean, technical diagram style with deadpan humor.
No extra text appears beyond the specified labels.
Pipeline includes network, queue, prefill, decode, and service segments.

grade.summary: All rubric items satisfied: correct title text, only specified labels, all required pipeline segments present and legible, and the visual style matches a clean, deadpan corporate technical diagram.
